title: Todo se me guarda en descargas
content:
Buenos días.

Por más que activo en los ajustes "Preguntar siempre dónde guardar los archivos", no me deja eliminar la opción de guardar en Descargas y directamente todo me lo descarga y guarda en la carpeta de Descargas, con lo que tengo que ir y mover el archivo donde quiero, ni tampoco me deja visualizarlo sin descargarlo.

He estado mirando soluciones como entrar en about:config y escribir browser.download.start_downloads_in_tmp_dir, cambiar por True, por False... pero sigue descargándome todo en Descargas sin preguntar.

Tengo la versión 127.0.2

¿Hay alguna solución? Gracias.
creator: charopidcr

title: YouTube VERY slow to start playing videos for the last 2-3 days
content:
For the past couple of days when I watch videos on YouTube on my iMac it's VERY slow to start. Sometimes it takes minutes, at which point I have to refresh, and best case it takes about 1 minute to start.

I have cleared the startup cache, cleared cookies and restarted Firefox.

Also, YouTube works normally on both Safari and Chrome.

Not a super 'tech' guy so any basic steps I can take are appreciated.

Thank you!

D
creator: damianc33

title: Instagram giving errors since update
content:
I'm getting this error when trying to access Instagram posts on here in the past few days:

Something Went Wrong

It opens regularly in every other browser I have.
creator: FireFoxFan1

title: Zeus.2020 Trojan
content:
Every time I open Firefox I get 3 pop up windows. 1. System is infected! Click here to scan and clean. Via.qowin.co.in 2. McAfee: System Alert! Click here to fix the error Via.qowin.co.in 3.McAfee: ZEUS.2020 Trojan detected Click here to delete the virus Via.qowin.co.in

I deleted McAfee. I cleared the cache. When Firefox opens it opens to qowin.co.in

How do I fix this?
creator: don.begezda

title: Need to know what is this update.exe
content:
When im starting my computer, suddenly this program with old firefox logo auto starting on windows taskbar, i cant open(maximize) it....when i hover to that old firefox logo, it just shows random text......

If i'm opening task manager, that program or something is in C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\AlphaPress under the name update.exe.....i alrd close that program, delete that, and running malwarebytes, but didnt find any threat.....If u can reassure me that it wasnt dangerous malware or anything....maybe some real firefox update?
creator: strayerwolf

title: Blank pages of 8 Grids under Recent Activity
content:
Dear Firefox Team,

It has occurred to my Firefox Browser of the latest version of 115 with some websites I have recently visited however which appear 8 grids of blank or white pages under "Recent Activity" as attached with the image for your technical troubleshooting suggestion.

Those 8 grids of Recent Activity in the older version of Firefox browsers used to have shown colorful graphics or images representative of the recent websites I visited in the recent past.

May I know what I am supposed to do to recover those graphics or images?

Kindly offer any suggestion or solution?

Thank you for your kind attention.


Best regards,


Mr. Topaz Chiu
creator: chiusungto

title: Logitech Webcam C930e - Google Meet Send Resolution 720p
content: I have in my laptop a external webcam a Logitech Webcam C930e. The webcam is a HD webcam with 1080p. But in Google Meet in Firefox I can only configure it at 720p but in Chrome I can configure it at 1080p. Why have that behavior?
creator: elrengo

title: How to select different device for Audio Output
content:
Hi! I have more than one device for Audio connected to my laptop. Obviously the default device provide by laptop but also I have a Jabra Headset EVOLVE 20 SE MS and Jabra Speaker SPEAK 510 USB/ Bluetooth. Also my webcam Logitech C930e provide a microphone.

When I use Google Meet, in Chrome I can select on Meet Audio Device Select the different microphone or Speakers but in Firefox I can only select the Default System Speaker.

I would like to know how to change between my Audio Devices for the output or can switch between my different speakers.
creator: elrengo
